views.markdown:
Version: 1.6.1 - Icon fix Version: 1.6 - iOS 10 support Version: 1.5-8
- iOS 9 support
Version: 1.5-5
- Improvement.
Version: 1.5-4
- Better code.
Version: 1.5-3
- Updated code.

Version: 1.5-2
- Fix some possible bugs.

Version: 1.5-1
- iOS 8 support.
- Improved codes.
Version: 1.4-9
- Compatible with iOS 7.1.x
Version: 1.4-8
- More efficient code are used.
Version: 1.4-7
- Supported iOS 7
- 64-bit Library included.
Version 1.4-6
- Use PanoMod method to use Torch in Panorama mode. (Better)
Version 1.4-5
- Fixed MobileSubstrate filter.
Version 1.4-4
- Added armv7s Library, for iPhone 5

Version 1.4-3
- Fixed for button not showing, Sorry users!

Version 1.4-2
- Better Panorama detection

Version 1.4-1
- Use the Native Flash button now !
- "Auto Off" function is now integrated with the flash mode "Auto", learn more from Settings
- Fixed Photo Flash mode not working.
- Compatible with InstantCamera

Various improvement

- Fixed delay when you screen is lock

- Flash button now look better.
- Removed "Unknown button" or the blank Flash Button when enter Panorama mode for more better look.
- Improved performance.
